text: Antonio Gandolfi (February 20, 1835 – March 20, 1902) was an Italian soldier and politician. He was the 2nd Italian Governor of Eritrea. He was a recipient of the Silver Medal of Military Valor. In June 1890 Francesco Crispi, president of the Council, appointed him Governor of Eritrea. ==References== * Policarpo Guaitoli, Ricordanze patrie.
